name: Manufacture Oil Or Jelly
effect: The alchemist manufactures gross material in the form of a sticky, viscous substance. To be imprinted in a salve, a spell must bolster, degrade or otherwise alter inorganic matter. The effect of the imprinted spell is triggered when the oil or jelly is rubbed onto the target object.

rotes.roteDescription: Free Council technophiles often carry around vials of oil ready to heal ailing machines, or to unobtrusively sabotage the operations of functioning items.
